item.title: Shops, airports and seafood markets bustling as countdown to Christmas is on
item.description: During this final week about 700,000 people are predicted to visit Australia’s biggest shopping centre.

item.title: Swiss skincare brand beloved by the Duchess of Cambridge launches ‘biggest sale of the year’
item.description: The brand is renowned for its pioneering oxygen-powered formulas.

item.title: Cameron Green could be dropped for Boxing Day as Aussies ponder all-out pace attack
item.description: ‘We’ve got some decisions to make.’

item.title: Surf Dive n’ Ski launches epic Boxing Day sale featuring Billabong, Quiksilver & Roxy summer essentials
item.description: Update your wardrobe for as little as $20.

item.title: Qantas flight from Singapore to Melbourne diverted to Adelaide due to technical issue
item.description: ‘Frustrating and irritating, because they told us about 30 minutes before we landed in Adelaide.’

item.title: Superstar Brooks Koepka cites ‘family reasons’ for bombshell move to quit LIV Golf
item.description: The five-time major winner has not shared immediate plans for his competitive future.

item.title: Cooking With Coles: Courtney Roulston and Michael Weldon share Christmas entree hacks
item.description: When it comes to the entree, no one can go past fresh prawns.

item.title: Alex ‘Chumpy’ Pullin’s widow Ellidy Pullin finds happiness again with new partner Brock Wadsworth
item.description: ‘That person is up there watching you and they want to see you smile.’

item.title: Norwegian man assaulted and robbed at St Kilda Beach, Melbourne
item.description: The man had intended to stay and spend Christmas in Australia however following the attack, he returned home.

item.title: Perth Bears poach Parramatta young gun Sean Russell on long-term deal
item.description: ‘He is a proven try-scorer and a fantastic defender.’

item.title: Woman charged after 19-year-old Zac McRae allegedly fatally stabbed at bus interchange near Mount Druitt station
item.description: A woman has been charged with murder.

item.title: Aussie basketball superstar Ben Simmons announces surprise move into competitive fishing
item.description: ‘Once you experience it and see what it’s about, you’re in awe of what the sport is.’

item.title: Chrissy Teigen loses front tooth in candy cane Christmas game ‘gone wrong’
item.description: The mum-of-four said: ‘I was trying to create magic. Now, I have no tooth.’

item.title: Cooking With Coles: Courtney Roulston and Michael Weldon share Christmas side recipes
item.description: Courtney Roulston and Michael Weldon have shared the recipes for their favourite side dishes for December 25.

item.title: Shane Warne to be honoured with special ‘tipping the hat’ tribute during Boxing Day Test
item.description: A host of cricket greats will take part in the act, while fans are also encouraged to join in.

item.title: Cooking With Coles: Fun twist on Christmas desserts
item.description: No matter how much Christmas lunch you eat there’s always room for dessert.

item.title: Woman, 77, dies after being struck by her own car at Sunshine Coast shopping centre car park
item.description: Witnesses were ‘clearly shaken’ as shoppers tried to help the woman.

item.title: Alex de Minaur vows to be nicer to himself as he confronts his biggest demons
item.description: ‘It’s a work in progress ... I wish I could say I’ve fixed that.’

item.title: England captain Ben Stokes addresses fallout from boozy Noosa trip with emotional pledge to teammates
item.description: ‘How I handle this moment right now is the most important thing to me.’

item.title: Chris Hemsworth on family holiday in Fiji with his father Craig to make memories after Alzheimer's diagnosis
item.description: The Australian actor is on a mission to reconnect with old memories, and to make new ones.

item.title: Celebrity chefs Sarah Todd and Declan Cleary welcome twin baby girls
item.description: The proud parents revealed what they named the new additions to their family.

item.title: Australian vet warns of the hidden dangers for cats and dogs during Christmas
item.description: ‘In some cases the distress is so severe.’

item.title: Good Samaritan comes to the rescue of Melbourne man being kidnapped by machete-wielding captors
item.description: A couple were out looking at Christmas lights when they saw the man trying to escape.

item.title: Christmas tragedy as search efforts for missing Shell Cove fisherman are scaled back
item.description: It’s been three days since the man was last seen.

item.title: Measles detection in Western Australia leads to urgent alert for residents across the state
item.description: Passengers on the flight from Bali are warned to watch for symptoms.

item.title: England cop another blow with Jofra Archer ruled out for remainder of Ashes series
item.description: The setback will raise fresh questions about the star’s future given his injury history.

item.title: Aussie swimmer Michael Klim engaged to partner Michelle Owen
item.description: ‘We are incredibly happy and excited to spend our lives together.’
